name: PLOPOLIS
description:
Populate islands with a community of tiny people that hatch from eggs for reasons unclear. You pick up eggs and when you plop them down they turn into people or buildings. You earn new eggs by trading the spoils of your work with the fluffy clouds above.

Things in the world may be replanted to change their nature based on what else is nearby. Experiment with arrangements to discover new buildings and earn more resources.

Have some thoughts to share? Join me on discord
